Frequently Asked Questions

What type of services do you offer as a software development company?

We offer a range of services which include custom software development, web and mobile application development, software testing and quality assurance, software maintenance and support, and technology consulting.

What are your software development specializations?

We specialize in enterprise software applications, e-commerce platforms, CRM (customer relationship management) systems, API integrations and more. Connect with us to learn more about our offered services.

What programming languages do we use for software development?

At Scriza, the popular programming languages utilized in software development are Java, Python, C++, JavaScript, and Ruby, among others.

We can provide an exact cost estimate for software development after thorough discussions about your goals and expectations and the defined scope of work.
